keyMappings:
unmapAll

map ? showHelp
map vs toggleViewSource

map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map u scrollPageUp
map d scrollPageDown

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map k scrollRight

map yy copyCurrentUrl

# links highlight mode
unmap f
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateMode

map K moveTabRight
map J moveTabLeft
map <a-k> nextTab
map <a-j> previousTab
map <a-h> goBack
map <a-l> goForward

map <a-e> Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map <a-b> Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map <a-w> removeTab
map <a-r> restoreTab
map <a-p> togglePinTab
map <a-d> duplicateTab
map <a-m> toggleMuteTab
map <a-c> closeOtherTabs
map <a-z> closeTabsOnLeft
map <a-x> closeTabsOnRight


# for youtube playback speed shortcut to work
unmap <<
unmap >>
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
